body: This belt grants its wearer a +2 enhancement bonus to Strength, and the ability to ignore difficult terrain while charging or making an overrun, bull rush, or trample attempt. Treat the enhancement bonus to Strength as a temporary ability bonus for the first 24 hours the belt is worn.
name: Minotaur Belt
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Belt/Belt Slot Wondrous Items/Minotaur Belt
